entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
